name: ai-catalog-saas
description: SaaS platform for AI software vendors to sell projects to banks and insurance companies

scripts.dev: npm run start:services && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.dev:full: npm run start:services && npm run reset:db && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.start:services: docker compose up -d && npm run wait:neo4j
scripts.wait:neo4j: node -e "const neo4j=require('neo4j-driver');const d=neo4j.driver('bolt://localhost:7687',neo4j.auth.basic('neo4j','password123'));async function wait(){let retries=30;while(retries>0){try{const s=d.session();await s.run('RETURN 1');await s.close();console.log('Neo4j ready!');break;}catch(e){console.log('Waiting for Neo4j...');retries--;await new Promise(r=>setTimeout(r,2000));}if(retries===0){console.error('Neo4j failed to start');process.exit(1);}}await d.close()}wait();"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
